headline.main: SHIPPING--MAILS; ALL HOURS GIVEN IN EASTERN STANDARD TIME

SHIPPING MAILS; ALL HOURS GIVEN IN EASTERN STANDARD TIME Ships That Arrived Yesterday Incoming Passenger and Mail Ships Ships That Departed Yesterday Outgoing Passenger and Mail Ships Reports From Foreign Ports Freighters and Tankers Due Today Outgoing Freighters Not Assigned Mail Overseas Plane Arrivals and Departures

docs.snippet: STAMP-ISSUING appears to be numerically on the wane.  During the year ending to day, only 2,413 major and minor varieties for postal paper have been thus far recorded, as compared with approximately 2,800 in 1949 and with around 3,100 in 1948.
docs.lead_paragraph: STAMP-ISSUING appears to be numerically on the wane. During the year ending to day, only 2,413 major and minor varieties for postal paper have been thus far recorded, as compared with approximately 2,800 in 1949 and with around 3,100 in 1948.
